features: PROTECT AND MONITOR YOUR VALUABLES 24/7: IF IT MOVES COMBINES GPS WITH MOTION DETECTION. Unlike a simple GPS tracker this device will give you a motion detection alert to your phone. Not only can you track where it is, you’ll know if it even moves an inch, notifying you before your belongings are gone.

ULTRA-SENSITIVE MOTION DETECTION WITH GPS TRACKING THAT YOU CAN LOCK TO YOUR VALUABLES: IF IT MOVES offers two secure metal loops that you can lock to your belongings. When unauthorized movement is detected, the device alerts you with push notifications to your smart phone and can email you whenever unwanted movement is detected.

REAL TIME MONITORING WITH YOUR MOBILE DEVICE: Tracking device for almost anything. In case your belongings are moved without your permission, alerts immediately. Thus, the ideal anti theft device that monitors in real time.

SECURE SYSTEM: YOUR DATA IS STORED ONLY ON YOUR PHONE, NOT IN THE CLOUD. The If It Moves device uses a VPN to transfer data to your phone alerting you of the movement of your valuables like, cars, motorcycles, camera bags, bicycles, RV, ATV, guns, equipment, etc.

LONG BATTERY LIFE | 10-14 DAYS STANDBY TIME with low battery alerts sent to your device. If It Moves motion detection device is smaller than a deck of cards and is EASY TO USE RECHARABLE MOTION DETECTION AND GPS TRACKER.

Flexible subscription: INITIAL 1-MONTH SUBSCRIPTION IS FREE. After the first month different renewal subscription levels are available to fit your needs. Don't pay for services you don't require. Why pay more than $20 per month? OUR PLANS START AT JUST $11.66 PER MONTH WITH A 1-YEAR PREPAY. NO CONTRACTS REQUIRED. COMPATIBLITY: Requires iOS 15 or higher for iPhone users and Android 11 or higher for Android users. Subscription Requirement: Monitoring service necessitates a subscription

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beefy Theft Deterrent + Superior Tracking GPS Device with low monthly cost
reviews.reviewText: As a photographer, traveler and motorcyclist, I'm always concerned about someone ripping me off! Which led me to look into GPS tracking devices. I looked at the Airtags and some others, but specifically wanted a unit that utilized cellular communications (instead of relying on a walled-garden like Apple's "Find My").The "If It Moves..." product fits the bill nicely. Although you do need to fully charge it out of the box, it comes with a pre-installed SIM card, an easy-to-use mobile app for iOS and Android (I use an iPhone), and a decent quick-start guide. Once the app is linked to the device and you've clicked one button to put it in Secure mode, you get notifications if it moves, and can see the device on a live map.Physically, this thing is a beast - and that's a good thing! The integrated metal loops let me easily lock it to things I care about. It's small enough to hide, but I think it also doubles as a Theft Deterrent. The blinking lights send the message that it's ACTIVELY in protection mode.I've had it for less than a week, but am pretty pleased with the purchase and the six-month free subscription is a nice bonus - the other ones I was looking at were like 20 bucks a month! This unit cost more upfront, but I’ll be saving money by the time the free subscription ends. Recommended.
